scripts.cypress-run-project: npm run clean-data && npm run run-project
scripts.cypress-run-examples: npm run clean-data && npm run run-examples
scripts.clean-data: npm run clean-report && npm run clean-videos && npm run clean-screenshots
scripts.test-smoke: echo @Smoke > grep-tag.txt && npx cypress run --env tags=@Smoke && npm run merge-reports
scripts.test-sanity: echo @Sanity > grep-tag.txt && cypress run --env tags=@Sanity && npm run merge-reports && npm run clean-reports
scripts.test-regression: echo @Regression > grep-tag.txt && npx cypress run --env tags=@Regression && npm run merge-reports && npm run clean-reports
